name: TDC - God Doesn't Play Dice With the Universe!
name_original: TDC - God Doesn't Play Dice With the Universe!
description:
Help God by controlling his hands to avoid the dices being cast into the universe, thus once again proving Einstein was right. The direction keys in the keyboard control the Hand of God. You start with 3 health points, and lose one each time a dice passes through you. Each time you allow an apple to go through you restore one health point. Beware of the Wrath of God, as calamities plague mankind, and your ears, if your health is low. 

Credits:

Jaspior: Art direction, Some polish and Story

KeichTS: Programing, Art and Testing

JulioCastaway: Story, Level Design and Testing   

Music and sound used:

"Dies Irae" - Breitkopf and Haertel (1880) Public Domain (CC0) No Attribution Required. Conversion and editing by TheOuterLinux.
